events.name: China accuses the US of sending dangerous signals to Taiwan
events.wd_label: China accuses the US of sending dangerous signals to Taiwan
events.wd_description: China accused the United States of sending "very wrong, dangerous signals" to Taiwan after US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told his Chinese counterpart that maintaining peace and stability over Taiwan was vitally important.
events.description: China accused the United States of sending "very wrong, dangerous signals" to Taiwan after US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told his Chinese counterpart that maintaining peace and stability over Taiwan was vitally important.

events.name: Blinken's statement
events.wd_description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi that maintaining peace and stability over Taiwan was vitally important.
events.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi that maintaining peace and stability over Taiwan was vitally important.

events.name: China’s accusation
events.wd_description: China accused the United States of sending "very wrong, dangerous signals" to Taiwan following Blinken's statement.
events.description: China accused the United States of sending "very wrong, dangerous signals" to Taiwan following Blinken's statement.

events.name: details of the meeting
events.wd_description: US officials reported that the 90-minute talks between Blinken and Wang Yi focused on Taiwan and were direct and honest, taking place on the margins of the UN General Assembly in New York.
events.description: US officials reported that the 90-minute talks between Blinken and Wang Yi focused on Taiwan and were direct and honest, taking place on the margins of the UN General Assembly in New York.

events.name: China’s stance on Taiwan
events.wd_description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry reiterated that the Taiwan issue is an internal Chinese matter and stated that the United States has no right to interfere in how it is resolved.
events.description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry reiterated that the Taiwan issue is an internal Chinese matter and stated that the United States has no right to interfere in how it is resolved.

events.name: Ukraine's long-range rocket strike on Russian forces
events.wd_label: Ukraine's long-range rocket strike on Russian forces
events.wd_description: Ukraine confirmed a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces in southern Ukraine, with plans for a counter-offensive using hundreds of thousands of troops.
events.description: Ukraine confirmed a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces in southern Ukraine, with plans for a counter-offensive using hundreds of thousands of troops.

events.name: Ukrainian strike
events.wd_description: Ukraine carried out a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces and military equipment in southern Ukraine.
events.description: Ukraine carried out a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces and military equipment in southern Ukraine.

events.name: Russian-installed authorities' report
events.wd_description: Russian-installed authorities reported that the attack resulted in at least seven deaths and around 70 injuries, claiming civilians and civilian infrastructure were hit.
events.description: Russian-installed authorities reported that the attack resulted in at least seven deaths and around 70 injuries, claiming civilians and civilian infrastructure were hit.

events.name: Ukraine's military statement
events.wd_description: Ukraine's southern military command reported that the strike resulted in the loss of 52 Russian personnel, a Msta-B howitzer, a mortar, seven vehicles, and an ammunition depot in Nova Kakhovka.
events.description: Ukraine's southern military command reported that the strike resulted in the loss of 52 Russian personnel, a Msta-B howitzer, a mortar, seven vehicles, and an ammunition depot in Nova Kakhovka.

events.name: Shenzhen enforces lockdowns due to Covid cases
events.wd_label: Shenzhen enforces lockdowns due to Covid cases
events.wd_description: Shenzhen, China, shut down the world's largest electronics market and suspended public transport in response to a small number of Covid cases, enforcing neighborhood-wide lockdowns.
events.description: Shenzhen, China, shut down the world's largest electronics market and suspended public transport in response to a small number of Covid cases, enforcing neighborhood-wide lockdowns.

events.name: lockdown of Huaqianbei market
events.wd_description: Huaqianbei, a busy shopping area with thousands of stalls selling electronic components, was placed under a mandatory four-day lockdown.
events.description: Huaqianbei, a busy shopping area with thousands of stalls selling electronic components, was placed under a mandatory four-day lockdown.

events.name: zero-Covid measures
events.wd_description: China continues to enforce stringent zero-Covid measures, with Shenzhen implementing strict lockdowns in response to Covid cases.
events.description: China continues to enforce stringent zero-Covid measures, with Shenzhen implementing strict lockdowns in response to Covid cases.

events.name: suspension of businesses
events.wd_description: Except for supermarkets, pharmacies, and hospitals, all businesses in the affected area were shut down through Thursday, with restaurant dining suspended and only takeaways allowed.
events.description: Except for supermarkets, pharmacies, and hospitals, all businesses in the affected area were shut down through Thursday, with restaurant dining suspended and only takeaways allowed.

events.name: identification of high-risk areas
events.wd_description: Dozens of neighborhoods across Shenzhen were identified as high-risk areas and placed under strict lockdown orders.
events.description: Dozens of neighborhoods across Shenzhen were identified as high-risk areas and placed under strict lockdown orders.

events.name: Strategies to develop a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the U.S.
events.wd_label: Strategies to develop a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the U.S.
events.wd_description: A comprehensive national strategy involving short-term, medium-term, and long-term measures to develop a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the U.S. and reduce reliance on China.
events.description: A comprehensive national strategy involving short-term, medium-term, and long-term measures to develop a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the U.S. and reduce reliance on China.

events.name: short-term measures
events.wd_description: Immediate actions to increase EV production in the U.S., including assembling EVs domestically, securing temporary waivers for imports, and expanding charging infrastructure.
events.description: Immediate actions to increase EV production in the U.S., including assembling EVs domestically, securing temporary waivers for imports, and expanding charging infrastructure.

events.name: t: domestic assembly
events.wd_description: Six of the ten best-selling EV models in 2022 are already assembled in the U.S., and more companies are planning to open assembly lines.
events.description: Six of the ten best-selling EV models in 2022 are already assembled in the U.S., and more companies are planning to open assembly lines.

events.name: t: temporary waiver for imports
events.wd_description: A temporary waiver for Korean-made EVs and batteries could facilitate the transition and encourage Korean battery makers to move their supply chain to the U.S.
events.description: A temporary waiver for Korean-made EVs and batteries could facilitate the transition and encourage Korean battery makers to move their supply chain to the U.S.

events.name: t: charging infrastructure expansion
events.wd_description: The 2021 Infrastructure Act provided $5 billion to expand charging infrastructure, which is critical for bolstering EV demand.
events.description: The 2021 Infrastructure Act provided $5 billion to expand charging infrastructure, which is critical for bolstering EV demand.

events.name: medium-term measures
events.wd_description: Diversifying lithium and cobalt supplies through international trade and diplomacy, and promoting the production of alternative battery chemistries.
events.description: Diversifying lithium and cobalt supplies through international trade and diplomacy, and promoting the production of alternative battery chemistries.

events.name: t: securing lithium supply
events.wd_description: Investing in regions like the Lithium Triangle of South America and partnering with Australia, which leads in lithium production and has rich cobalt deposits.
events.description: Investing in regions like the Lithium Triangle of South America and partnering with Australia, which leads in lithium production and has rich cobalt deposits.

events.name: t: securing cobalt supply
events.wd_description: Partnering with Australian mining companies and avoiding reliance on cobalt from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
events.description: Partnering with Australian mining companies and avoiding reliance on cobalt from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

events.name: t: promoting alternative batteries
events.wd_description: Supporting the production of lithium-iron-phosphate (LFP) batteries, which are cheaper and use more abundant minerals, as patents expire and production scales up.
events.description: Supporting the production of lithium-iron-phosphate (LFP) batteries, which are cheaper and use more abundant minerals, as patents expire and production scales up.

events.name: long-term measures
events.wd_description: Replacing overseas critical materials with domestic mining operations and investing in the research and development of new battery technologies.
events.description: Replacing overseas critical materials with domestic mining operations and investing in the research and development of new battery technologies.

events.name: t: domestic mining
events.wd_description: Developing domestic mining operations for lithium and cobalt, despite the lengthy permitting process, to reduce reliance on foreign sources.
events.description: Developing domestic mining operations for lithium and cobalt, despite the lengthy permitting process, to reduce reliance on foreign sources.

events.name: t: R&D investment
events.wd_description: Investing in research and development of new battery technologies to build a sustainable and competitive EV battery industry in the U.S.
events.description: Investing in research and development of new battery technologies to build a sustainable and competitive EV battery industry in the U.S.
